intro: Dortmanna stricta, commonly known as the rigid Dortmanna, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Apiaceae. It is characterized by its slender, upright stems and small, greenish-white flowers that appear in umbels. The plant typically grows in moist, calcareous soils and is often found in meadows and along stream banks. Its leaves are lance-shaped and have a distinct, aromatic scent. Dortmanna stricta is a perennial herb that plays a role in supporting local pollinators and maintaining ecological balance in its habitat.
